specific1.title: Better Interoperability
specific1.content: Tokamak Network allows fast transactions with optimistic and ZK rollups, and interoperability with other L2 solutions.

specific2.title: L2 On-Demand
specific2.content: Tokamak Network simplifies service scaling and ecosystem integration with easy L2 deployment. See below for more details.

specific3.title: Scalable Ecosystem
specific3.content: Tokamak Network supports TONStarter, a decentralized launchpad that simplifies fundraising and easily integrates with Tokamak Network’s L2.

main.description2: 坦克网络（Tokamak Network）是一个以太坊二层协议（Layer 2）前沿技术的整合平台，任何人都可以按需部署合适的二层协议解决方案

roadmaps.subject: Networking the Layer 2 networks
roadmaps.title: Support all types of layer 2 protocol in Tokamak Network.
contents: Support Optimistic Rollup : Optimism, Arbitrum, and more
Support Zk-Rollup : StarkEx, zkSync, and more
Support Plasma : Tokamak plasma and more

roadmaps.subject: Networking the Layer 2 networks
roadmaps.title: Integrate all layer 2 protocol with TON ecosystem
contents: Integrate all layer 2 protocols with TON seigniorage pool, PowerTON game, DAO governance

roadmaps.subject: Networking the Layer 2 networks
roadmaps.title: Support full verification from day one

tokamak_info.title: 使用坦克网络 今儿

l2.content: Rather than relying on someone else’s L2 network, create your own L2 based on your specific needs. Choose a permissionless L2 architecture that meets your requirements without compromising on speed or security. This service is coming later.
l2.serviceIntro1: Customized L2 stack built on Optimism, which offers fast and affordable computation and state updates by using optimistic rollup. Along with Optimism’s capabilities, this stack also includes a flexible transaction fee to enhance the user experience.
l2.serviceIntro2: Cutting-edge virtual machine for L2, designed to work with ZKSNARKS. It supports a previously unseen L2 rollup architecture that reduces computational complexity without compromising security or privacy.
